short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searching bar for easy searching in internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We provide our users the Easy Search bar to make them searching fast and realy easy!

With our search bar, you relax and search for what you need more efficiently and without external stimuli. 
The simple design in our search bar to attract new users to our community. Only install Easy-Search and you are wellcome!


By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this extension on your desktop, you are accepting and agreeing to install the Easy-Search Chrome extension, and understand that your browser new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with Microsoft Bing search results, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.
